# [Interview #506: JordanCon 2010 Q&A Report - Terez, Entry #18](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=506#18)

#### Question

Which plot lines will be important in
*Towers of Midnight*
?

#### Maria Simons

Pretty much any major character that was not in
*The Gathering Storm*
will be seen in
*Towers of Midnight*
.
